text: The Democratic Alliance, popularly known as the DA, is the main opposition political party in South Africa. It is led by John Steenhuisen.| DA in process of appointing new CT mayor EWN| Is South Africa's Democratic Alliance serious about tackling racism? - BBC News| Is the downfall of the ANC in South Africa inevitable?
